price: 22. Boye soki bopesi mokongo, bokokende te тропа kotia mobulu na nsé mpe kokata bondeko ya mabota? (soki bolingi bokonzi koleka)
arabic: فَهَلۡ عَسَيۡتُمۡ إِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ أَن تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوٓاْ أَرۡحَامَكُمۡ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fahal ʿasaytum in tawallaytum an tuf'sidū fī al-arḍi watuqaṭṭiʿū arḥāmakum
